title: Prime Minister shares Sanskrit Subhashitam emphasising the wisdom of living in the present
content:
Press Release:Press Information Bureau Prime Minister's Office Prime Minister shares Sanskrit Subhashitam emphasising the wisdom of living in the present प्रविष्टि तिथि:
                22 DEC 2025 9:03AM by PIB Delhi The Prime Minister, Shri Narendra Modi, shared a Sanskrit Subhashitam- “गते शोको न कर्तव्यो भविष्यं नैव चिन्तयेत्। वर्तमानेन कालेन वर्तयन्ति विचक्षणाः॥” The Subhashitam conveys that one should not grieve over the past nor worry about the future, and that the wise act only in the present. The Prime Minister wrote on X; “गते शोको न कर्तव्यो भविष्यं नैव चिन्तयेत्। वर्तमानेन कालेन वर्तयन्ति विचक्षणाः॥” गते शोको न कर्तव्यो भविष्यं नैव चिन्तयेत्। वर्तमानेन कालेन वर्तयन्ति विचक्षणाः॥ pic.twitter.com/DsAfM1m5UC — Narendra Modi (@narendramodi) December 22, 2025 ********* MJPS/ST (रिलीज़ आईडी: 2207281) आगंतुक पटल  : 52 Prime Minister's Office Prime Minister shares Sanskrit Subhashitam emphasising the wisdom of living in the present प्रविष्टि तिथि:
